name: Resume Parsing & Profile Enrichment
description: AI-powered resume parsing workflow that automatically extracts nursing certifications, specialties, experience, skills, and education from uploaded resumes using OpenAI, then enriches candidate profiles in your database
useCase: Healthcare recruiters receive hundreds of nursing resumes and manually extracting certifications, specialties, and experience is time-consuming. This workflow uses AI to automatically parse resumes, extract structured data, calculate profile completeness scores, and enrich candidate records.

external: Google Sheet with 'Candidates' tab including columns: candidate_id, candidate_name, certifications, specialties, years_experience, education, skills, work_history, languages, licenses, parsed_date, enrichment_score, profile_completeness
Web form or application that can POST resume text to webhook URL
environment: SHEET_URL - Direct URL to your Google Sheet

author: Caphe Workflows
features: Automatic extraction of nursing certifications (RN, CNA, BSN, etc.)
Email notifications to recruiters with parsed data
limitations: Requires OpenAI API key (costs $0.01-0.03 per resume)
Resume must be in text format (PDF conversion needed separately)
AI accuracy depends on resume quality and formatting
No support for resume file upload (text/URL only)
